5  CircPlanner::CircPlanner(ros::NodeHandle &nh) : Planner(nh)
6  {
7  planner_name = "CircularPlanner";
8  params_["radius"] = 1;
9  std::cout << "loaded circular planner\n";

12  void CircPlanner::forward(Eigen::Isometry3d mov, int steps)
13  {
14  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
15  for (int i = 0; i < steps; i++)
16  {
17  next_ = next_ * mov;
18  auto q = Eigen::Quaterniond(next_.rotation());
19  pose = geometry_msgs::PoseStamped();
20  pose.pose.position.x = next_.translation().x();
21  pose.pose.position.y = next_.translation().y();
22  pose.pose.position.z = next_.translation().z();
23  pose.pose.orientation.x = q.x();
24  pose.pose.orientation.y = q.y();
25  pose.pose.orientation.z = q.z();
26  pose.pose.orientation.w = q.w();
27  path_.poses.push_back(pose);
28  }
29  }
30 
31  nav_msgs::Path CircPlanner::doPlan(std::vector<double> start, std::vector<double> goal)
32  {
33  // path_ = nav_msgs::Path();
34  // path_.header.frame_id = "map";
35  radius_ = params_["radius"];
36 
37  Eigen::Affine3d baseT(Eigen::Translation3d(start[0], start[1], start[2]) *
38  Eigen::AngleAxisd(start[3], Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ()));
39  // Eigen::Quaterniond baseq(baseT.rotation());
40 
41  // ---------------------------------------------------------------
42  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped poseS;
43 
44  Eigen::Affine3d poseT;
45  double arcStep = 10 * M_PI / 180;
46  // double range = 0;
47  for (double theta = 0; theta < 2 * M_PI; theta += arcStep)
48  {
49  // these two can be one line, checl l8r
50  Eigen::Affine3d poseC(Eigen::AngleAxisd(theta, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ()));
51  poseC.translation() = Eigen::Vector3d(cos(theta) * radius_, sin(theta) * radius_, 0);
52 
53  poseT = baseT * poseC;
54 
55  poseS.pose.position.x = poseT.translation().x();
56  poseS.pose.position.y = poseT.translation().y();
57  poseS.pose.position.z = poseT.translation().z();
58 
59  poseT.rotate(Eigen::AngleAxisd(3.1415, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ()));
60  Eigen::Quaterniond q(poseT.rotation());
61  poseS.pose.orientation.x = q.x();
62  poseS.pose.orientation.y = q.y();
63  poseS.pose.orientation.z = q.z();
64  poseS.pose.orientation.w = q.w();
65  path_.poses.push_back(poseS);
66  }
67 
68  return path_;
69  }
70 }
